markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Wasp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=405)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Giant wasps are much more dangerous but less common than their smaller kin, and—to the relief of those who encounter them—they tend to be solitary.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Wasp_GiantWasp.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Giant Wasp](/Monsters.aspx?ID=405)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 324</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +12 ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)),
**Damage** 1d12+4 piercing plus giant wasp venom

**Implant Eggs** <actions string="Single Action" />  The giant wasp lays eggs in an adjacent creature that is paralyzed or unconscious, exposing it to the wasp larva disease.

**Giant Wasp Venom**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 19; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** no effect (1 round); **Stage 2** clumsy 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** paralyzed (1 round)

**Wasp Larva**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 21; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1d6 days); **Stage 2** drained 1 (1d3 days); **Stage 3** 5d6 damage, larva emerges (disease ends)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-99" />
name: Giant Wasp
